title: Himi 35
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko ‘eku ngāue eni
Ke u fai mo fakahā
‘A ‘ene mā’oni’oni
Mo e Folofola.
2.
Pea u sīkaki kalanga
‘A e lea ‘ofa,
Ke mou vakai ki he Lami
‘A hotau ‘Otua.
3.
‘Ofa ke u malanga ‘aki
‘A hono huafa,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē
Ko honau hūfanga.
4.
Pea u faka’osi‘aki
‘A ‘eku mānava
‘I he’eku tangi, pehē
Vakai ki he Lami.
5.
Pea ke ongo’i ia
Pea mo’ui ai
‘A māmani kotoa pē
Pea fai ma’u ai pē. *
